title: The Arts @ EU Scholarship Days blend passion and education into opportunity for students (Evangel ...
text: ( Source : Evangel University ) News Release October 20 , 2015 | Evangel University News SPRINGFIELD, Mo. - High school and transfer students with a strong background in the arts are invited to attend The Arts @ EU Scholarship Days at Evangel
